headline: SPUS: 10 Stocks To Complement This Shariah-Compliant S&P 500 ETF
summary: SPUS offers Shariah-compliant exposure to U.S. equities but is tech-heavy and riskier than standard index ETFs. Check out why SPUS ETF is a hold.
